name: silicon production, single crystal, Czochralski process, electronics | silicon, single crystal, Czochralski process, electronics | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4401/documentation

Production of a monocrystalline block with a diameter of 130mm and a length of 150cm. Losses of non-recycled material due to block cutting are included.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Gate to gate inventory for the Czochralski process. Crushing of Si, etching with HNO3, HF and acetic acid. Melting in a silica pot and crystallisation to produce a monocrystalline material. Water emissions roughly estimated. Process emissions to air are not known.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Most data are published in 2006. Some older data published in 1992.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for a plant in DE and estimation for RER.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Czochralski process for production of monocrystalline silicon blocks. Than edges are sliced and blocks are sawn.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: none This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Publication of plant specific (partly aggregated) data.
